questions.quote: Too bad you can't do that for a living. You'd be very successful at it. You could sell out Madison Square Garden. Thousands of people could watch you! You could be a big star!
You might regret that, because the money my wife spends on clothes...
Hey Bob. What's with you? You gotta problem?  You see that look he gave me?
I'll tell you what, if pig-man shows up, we'll squeeze him in. I'll see you later.
We have some *delicious* Chateau Briande, my personal favourite. Or, if you prefer something lighter, a poached Dover sole in a delicate white wine sauce with just a *hint* of saffron.
Ladies and gentlemen, could I direct your attention to the center ring, where the incomparable Misha will balance ten stories above the circus floor on a wire no wider than a human thumb.
Well, don't they make a counter offer? How can they just cancel the whole deal like that? What kind of a maniac is this guy? I mean he just, he says no, and that's it?
You know all those stores canceled out on her? She's finished.  We're  finished.
You know, sometimes I get the feeling George isn't being completely honest with me.
Sophie, it's me. I know about the tractor story and I'm fine with it.
